org.mockito.stubbing

接口 Stubbing

  • 所有超级接口:
    Answer
    所有已知实现类:
    StubbedInvocationMatcher

    @NotExtensible
public interface Stubbing
extends Answer
    Stubbing declared on the mock object. See detailed description including sample code and use cases see javadoc for MockingDetails.getStubbings().

    Since 2.10.0 this interface extends Answer. Extending Answer is backwards compatible because Stubbing interface is not extensible (see NotExtensible). Extending Answer was needed to improve Mockito domain model and simplify the code.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.2.3

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Invocation getInvocation()
      Returns the method invocation that is stubbed.
      boolean wasUsed()
      Informs if the stubbing was used What does it mean 'used stubbing'?

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.mockito.stubbing.Answer

        answer

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInvocation

        Invocation getInvocation()
        Returns the method invocation that is stubbed. E.g. in the example stubbing when(mock.foo()).thenReturn(true) the invocation is mock.foo().

        The invocation instance is mutable. It is not recommended to modify the state of invocation because it will influence mock behavior.

        To understand how this method is useful, see the description at MockingDetails.getStubbings().

        从以下版本开始:
        2.2.3

      • wasUsed

        boolean wasUsed()
        Informs if the stubbing was used

        What does it mean 'used stubbing'? Stubbing like when(mock.foo()).thenReturn(true) is considered used when the method mock.foo() is actually invoked during the execution of code under test.

        This method is used internally by Mockito to report and detect unused stubbings. Unused stubbings are dead code and should be deleted to increase clarity of tests (see MockitoHint.

        To understand how this method is useful, see the description at MockingDetails.getStubbings().

        从以下版本开始:
        2.2.3
